entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing after midnight. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning then light in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023
